graph.node

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.node.Node
      • graph.node.Operation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Addition, GEMM, Multiplication

    public abstract class Operation
extends Node
    An Operation represents a node which applies an operation to one or more inputs. Operation implements Callable, as their results must be accessed as a Future list when called by an ExecutorService to ensure that consumers have the required values to proceed before running. The Operation node must also implement a differentiation method, which calculates its derivative.
